IntroText: Hi!  Are you new in our college?|Class starts at eight o'clock.
Hi!  I can't believe you tied up Sidney.|She does look cute like that though.
Anything else you want to know|or we focus on today's class?
(She looks at the black haired|girl and seems scared.)
I would love to talk but I need to get my|notes ready.  Let's meet after class.
I really don't have time to talk.
(She giggles.)  Sidney is so cute like that.|But maybe you should untie her before class.
Why do you have rope here?
Please be careful with my clothes.|(She seems very humiliated.)
Oh god!  The class will start very soon.|(She tugs futilely on the ropes to get out.)
Thanks for letting me go. (She smiles.)
Thanks for letting me go and Sidney's cute like that.|But maybe you should untie her before class.
